.
Preparing Administrative Decisions
When required, prepare a formal administrative decision for approval by a senior claims processor.
Prepare the administrative decision on
VA Form 21P-5427
.  If the information needed to fully complete
VA Form 21P-5427
is not of record, initiate development for a completed
VA Form 21P-8049
.
Note
:  Ensure documentation of calculations made to determine the rate of benefits (such as calculations of medical expenses, net worth, and waived overpayments) are included in the electronic claims folder (eFolder).  Any document that contains Federal tax information (FTI), must be stored in the restricted FTI File Repository (FFR).
References
:  For more information on
who is responsible for including documentation of calculations in the eFolder, see
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, 1.A.2.c
the life expectancy table for net worth determinations, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 1.J.7.a
, and
developing for net worth information, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart i, 3.A
.
